derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from late Latin ocularis, from Latin oculus 'eye'

entry.def: Ocular means relating to the eyes or the ability to see.

example.ex: Other ocular signs include involuntary rhythmic movement of the eyeball.

means.word_mean: 1. combination of lenses at the viewing end of optical instruments
1. of or relating to or resembling the eye;

sentences.sentence: "the optic (or optical) axis of the eye"
